check.name: LocalVariableName
check.description: Checks that local, non-{@code final} variable names conform to a specified pattern. A catch parameter is considered to be a local variable.

property.name: allowOneCharVarInForLoop
property.description:
Allow one character variable name in initialization expressions in FOR loop if one char variable name is prohibited by {@code format} regexp. For example: 
 for (int i = 1; i < 10; i++) { // OK
     int j = 1; // violation
 }
 for (int K = 1; K < 10; K++) { // OK
     int j = 1; // violation
 }
 List list = new ArrayList();
 for (Object o : list) { // OK
     int j = 1; // violation
 }
 for (Object O : list) { // OK
     int j = 1; // violation
 }
